InfoText: After finishing this lesson,  you will be able to...
[ store text as a remark element.
[ input a confidential remark.
[ input a client billing address.
[ input a mail address.
<PgDn>
Solutions: PD

InfoText: Free text may be stored in a PNR as a remark element. The transaction code
RM^ is used to input remark elements,  as follows:
RM^ADVISE CLIENT ABOUT EXCHANGE RATES
Input this entry.
Solutions: RM

InfoText: Any free text may be typed after the transaction code RM. Input the entry to
ignore the transaction.
Solutions: IG

InfoText: The following entry will retrieve the PNR for the surname Columbus:
RT/COLUMBUS^
Input this entry.
Solutions: RT/COLUMBUS

InfoText: Abbreviations are often used in remark elements. For example,  the text
PSGR^ ADV^ DOCS^ is commonly used to indicate that the passenger was advised
about documents needed for international travel. Input this text as a remark
element.
Solutions: RM

InfoText: The following are examples of common remark entries:
RMPSGR^ ADV^ DOCS^            Passenger advised of travel documents
RMPSGR^ ADV^ XNCL^ PENALTY^    Passenger advised of cancellation penalty
RMPSGR^ ADV^ FARE^ INCR^       Passenger advised of fare increase
Study the examples. Then input the entry to indicate that the passenger was
advised of a fare increase.
Solutions: RM

InfoText: Remark elements are free-format. When a PNR is changed,  or when new elements
are added,  a received-from entry must be input before the transaction is
ended. Assume the passenger requested the service. Input the received-from
information and end the transaction with one entry.
Solutions: RFP;ET

InfoText: The transaction code RC^ is used to input a confidential remark,  as follows:
RC^UNLISTED PHONE/FRA 069 234554
A confidential remark is visible only to the office where the entry was
input. Input this entry.
Solutions: RC

InfoText: Input the following text as a confidential remark: CONFIDENTIAL^ TRAVEL^
Solutions: RC

InfoText: Ignore the transaction.
Solutions: IG

InfoText: Input the name entry for Mr. B. Hive.
Solutions: NM1HIVE/BMR
NM1HIVE/B MR
NM1HIVE/B

InfoText: The transaction code AB^ is used to input a client billing address,  as
follows:
AB^MR B HIVE, 65 GEORGE STREET, LONDON SW7 4LH
Note that , ^ is typed to indicate a new line. Input this entry.
Solutions: ABMR B HIVE, 65 GEORGE ST, LONDON SW7 4LH
ABMR B HIVE, 65 GEORGE STREET, LONDON SW7 4LH
ABMR B HIVE, 65 GEORGE ST, LONDON SW74LH
